extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance does many maintenance functions to aid with a much smoother PSMC experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notifies when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space (you can set and change sizes), cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has Backup/Restore Options, Speed test, and other features!![CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]

This addon allows you to stream or download video files that are already transfered into your Real-Debrid account! The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. extension.summary: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the PSMC-20 Repository on GitHub.
extension.description: Launches Big Box from within PSMC - It will close or minimize PSMC and when Big Box is exited, PSMC will restart or maximize. Also has options to run programs pre or post BigBox. It works with PSMC or Kodi on Windows platform ONLY.[CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
AZR Redux de Papaw se basa en el aspecto original de Arctic Zephyr creado por jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se trata de ser simple, limpio, minimalista y extremadamente personalizable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
Papaw's AZR Redux sukurtas remiantis originalia Arctic Zephyr oda, kurią sukūrė jurialmunkey. Papaw AZR Redux yra paprastas, švarus, minimalistinis ir labai pritaikomas.
Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux opiera się na oryginalnej skórce Arctic Zephyr stworzonej przez Jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux ma być prosty, czysty, minimalistyczny i niezwykle konfigurowalny.
Papaw's AZR Redux se bazează pe pielea originală Arctic Zephyr creată de jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux este despre a fi simplu, curat, minimalist și extrem de personalizabil.
AZR Redux от Papaw основан на оригинальном скине Arctic Zephyr, созданном jurialmunkey. AZR Redux от Papaw — простой, понятный, минималистичный и чрезвычайно настраиваемый.
